articles.description: Annular eclipses occur when the Moon is not quite close enough to our planet to completely obscure sunlight, leaving a thin ring of the solar disc visible.
articles.title: 'Ring of fire' solar eclipse to dim Africa, Asia - eNCA
articles.content:
PARIS - Skywatchers along a narrow band from west Africa to the Arabian Peninsula, India and southern China will witness on Sunday a dramatic "ring of fire" solar eclipse.
